task.title: How to Configure a WebDAV Connection

taskbody.context: By default is configured to contain a WebDAV data source connection called WebDAV (S)FTP. Based on this data source you can create a WebDAV connection for browsing and editing data from a database that provides a WebDAV interface. The connection will be available in the Data Source Explorer view. The steps for configuring a WebDAV connection are the following:

step.cmd: Go to menu Preferences Data Sources .
In the Connections panel click the New button.
Enter a unique name for the connection.
Select one of the WebDAV data sources in the Data Source combo box.

substep.cmd: Set the URL to the WebDAV repository in the field WebDAV URL.
Set the user name to access the WebDAV repository in the field User.
Set the password to access the WebDAV repository in the field Password.

step.info: To watch our video demonstration about the WebDAV support in , go to http://www.oxygenxml.com/demo/WebDAV_Support.html.
